dependencies.name: Documentation Theme Install (globally)
dependencies.description: This hack is only used because the better-docs theme has a security vulnerability that would be assumed as a security risk for the repo, when its only used to generate documentation

actions.cmd: sh -c "theme=`npm ls -g better-docs | grep better-docs` && [ -z \"$theme\" ] && npm install -g better-docs taffydb || echo \"Documentation Theme already Installed\""
